```{r}
all<-read.csv("GeneraListMatrix_fn9.csv")
class(all)

head(all)

totals
```

```{r}
AppState<-read.csv("AppState_Binomials.csv")
AppState
Bucknell<-read.csv("Bucknell_Binomials.csv")
Bucknell
two=rbind(AppState, Bucknell)

```


```{r}
two.ab=count(two)
two.ab
first_two.ab<-data.frame("first_two", two.ab[,1:2])
first_two.ab
names(first_two.ab)<-c("ListID", "SpeciesID", "Freq")
first_two.ab
```
